name: Rooftop Laundry Service - Cafe & Bar
address: 84 Ngo Duc Ke, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
description: Cozy rooftop Laundry, with cafe & bar service. Chill on the rooftop while getting your laundry done.
example_reviews: This rooftop laundry shop in District 1, right across from Bitexco Tower, is a hidden gem. It‚Äôs a simple but smart idea ‚Äî do your laundry while enjoying a great cup of coffee and a beautiful city view. The prices are fair, and the staff are friendly and welcoming. The coffee is smooth and delicious, whether you like it strong or creamy. It‚Äôs more than just a place to wash clothes ‚Äî it turns a boring chore into a relaxing experience. If you‚Äôre in the area, it‚Äôs definitely worth a visit.

We are arround around and finally find this Self Service Laundry on the rooftop While waiting we have salt coffee, egg coffee, and it excellent! Price for laundry very good price The only thing you have to go to the rooftop to do it, but it is the central of the City.
Laundry cafe make every visit pleasant, and it‚Äôs clear they care about their customers.thanks to its prime location in the bustling Ngo Duc Ke area.

name: B·∫øp M·∫π ·ªân
address: 136/9 ƒê∆∞·ªùng L√™ Th√°nh T√¥n, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
description: It is all about Vietnamese food. Lovely staff and at such a beautiful place reminding Vietnam at its 1975 as the pearl of South East Asia. Tasting Mama's In food and surrounded with windows and scenes of simple Vietnamese and stuff make the delicious food even more delicious.
example_reviews: Traditional looking restaurant in a courtyard of restaurants and caf√©s up an alleyway opposite the Ben Than Market ( north side - Le Thanh Ton Street) and claiming to (and probably is) serving home cooking style meals. Varied though complicated menu - specialist noodle dishes (on a separate menu) are brought in from the place next door - complicate things if you want to pay by credit card. (No fee if you pay by credit card just for food and drink off the restaurants own menu.). Very tasty food, prompt and helpful service. We sat downstairs on long tables, so other diners next to us, as the upstairs seemed airless - without a balcony or window. Breath of salad range and vegetarian options seem limited. Some dishes, like snakehead fish we have not seen elsewhere. Good value ‚Äì means 100-240k approx, sides about 30k. We spent about 450k between the two of us.

This restaurant was recommended by our guide when we first arrived in Saigon. We went there on our first evening, and then back again for lunch on our final day. It is situated down a narrow alleyway but we found it easily with the instructions given by our guide. (He mentioned that this was his 'go to' restaurant when he was going for a meal with friends.) The restaurant is small and you will generally have to share one of the long tables with other people. You may also need to wait to be seated, though on both occasions the wait was no more than ten minutes (after initially being told that it could be half an hour). However, it is worth it as the food is very good, albeit a bit more expensive than in some other establishments. (And note that the menu price does not include tax which adds 8% to the bill.)

Located down a small street near Ben Thanh Market in Ho Chi Minh City, B·∫øp M·∫π ·ªàn (which translates to ‚ÄúMom‚Äôs Kitchen‚Äù) is a hidden gem. Here‚Äôs why you should consider dining here: Tasty Vietnamese Flavors: B·∫øp M·∫π ·ªàn serves up authentic Vietnamese cuisine that bursts with flavor. From deep-fried tofu with impeccably crispy exteriors to succulent grilled chicken legs, your taste buds are in for a treat. Fantastic Price Value: If you‚Äôre looking for a budget-friendly meal without compromising on quality, this is the place. B·∫øp M·∫π ·ªàn offers a wide variety of dishes at wallet-friendly prices. Friendly Staff: The staff here are warm, friendly, and attentive. Whether you‚Äôre a local or a traveler, they‚Äôll make you feel right at home. Refreshing Drinks and Desserts: Pair your meal with interesting and refreshing drinks. And don‚Äôt forget to explore their dessert options‚Äîthey‚Äôre delightful! Pro Tip: Try the Grilled Chicken Leg with Chilli Salt and thank me later! Remember, this review is based on available sources, so if you get a chance to visit B·∫øp M·∫π ·ªàn yourself, share your personal experience with others!

name: Truffle Restaurant
address: 208 Nguyen Huu Canh Level 73, Vincom Landmark 81, Vinhomes Central Park, Ward 22, Binh Thanh, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
description: Truffle Restaurant in Landmark 81 offers an exquisite dining experience overlooking the beautiful skyline of Ho Chi Minh City. The restaurant serves set menus with a focus on French cuisine, using the freshest and highest-quality ingredients. The relaxed and elegant atmosphere, accompanied by knowledgeable and attentive staff, ensures a memorable dining experience. The menu also features a selection of fine wines and spirits to complement the delicious meal. For those seeking a luxurious and indulgent dining experience, Truffle Restaurant in Landmark 81 is definitely worth a visit.
example_reviews: The overall experience was wonderful! It makes the price seem cheap compared to the excellent quality of service and food here! The staffs are all really nice and they make your dininng time feel heartwarm. In particular, Alex was hearty in showing the way, Kayla is an excellent bartender who caters for her guests in a very active, friendly way. I am also especially impressed at Francis for his food knowledge, his friendliness and engagement when serving his customers. As for the food, gotta say Chef Pierrick has both a great sense of arts and excellent cooking level! Our food was both gorgeous to look at and exquisite to dine! Totally deserving of the Michelin stars he got! Made our anniversary an unforgettable memory!

The view and amazing service captivated me, not to mention the stellar, well thought out dishes. A perfect combination of elegance, atmosphere, and thought provoking food created an amazing experience. will come again

Good food; nice staff and a really nice view over Saigon. The restaurant to get away from the traffic and in a distance really enjoy the atmosphere of the town. If you‚Äôre planning to eat it could be a good idea to book a seat the evening before, , but cozy.The view is great, the staff are super friendly and the food is delicious! Highly recommend!

name: Cloud Nine Sai Gon Restaurant
address: 180 -188 Ly Tu Trong Street 11th Floor, La Siesta Premium Saigon Hotel, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
description: A chic and intimate space living up to its name. This is one of the best spots in Sai Gon to enjoy drinks as the sun sets over Park and Ben Thanh Market. Offering 270-degree city views, the environment created is the best of all worlds. ‚ÄúLuxuriously high enough up to delight in exquisitely romantic views of Park in its entirety, yet close enough to feel at eye level and at one with the city streets and rooftops. Beautifully and atmospherically designed ‚Äì glass, metal and wood complement a monochromatic color palate of black, granite grey and hints of cream. Background chill-out music creates a trendy understated vibe. The overall effect is one of charming elegance.‚Äù The Twilight Bar is La Siesta Premium pi√®ce de r√©sistance ‚Äì with an extensive range of international wines, signature cocktails, beers and spirits a well as an exciting menu of non-alcoholic beverages.
example_reviews: Saigon has countless restaurants on high floors, but from this one you not only have great views, but also a culinary experience of the highest standard. The truffle mushroom soup was a poem, the fish each exquisite and refined and the service beyond any doubt. We have been to one of the ‚Äúsister restaurants‚Äù in Hoi An twice before and were fully enthusiastic here as well. Prices are slightly higher for the country level, of course, but in all Western countries you would probably pay double for dinner at this level. Accordingly, a fair deal for visitors to the city with high standards of cuisine.

Cloud Nine is a real rare gem! Upon arrival, we were greeted with elegance and great courtesy. The service is impeccable, attentive without being intrusive. Each dish was a work of art, combining creativity, finesse and exquisite flavours. The atmosphere of the restaurant is simply mesmerizing: dim light, soft music, and a refined decoration that invites relaxation. Perfect for a romantic dinner or a special occasion. We spent a moment suspended out of time. An unmissable address for lovers of fine dining!

We came here for our last dinner before leaving Vietnam after a 3 week trip. We chose from the a la carte, their spring rolls were the best we‚Äôve had and we were recommended the fillet steaks which were flamboyantly finished off by our table with flames. We have eaten Vietnamese every day of our holiday so far but although a western dish it had a Vietnamese twist. Staff were attentive and friendly. Views spectacular. Highly recommended for a special meal.

name: Secret Garden Vietnamese Restaurant
address: 19 Le Cong Kieu Street, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
description: Warmly welcome you to the newly renovated Secret Garden 2nd Branch - Vietnamese Restaurant. A prime location just 2 mins walk from B·∫øn Th√†nh Market & MRT B·∫øn Th√†nh. It's design a tribute to the timeless beauty of Vietnam‚Äôs Northwest highlands. The crafted rustic bricks roof, the wooden pillars, the soil & mud textured walls carry the ancient of village homes. Surrounding it all, a lush tropical garden thrives, vibrant & alive.
example_reviews: The rustic decor, from soil-textured walls to lush greenery, transported us to Vietnam‚Äôs highlands. We lingered over tender shaking beef and tangy green mango salads, paired with icy sugarcane juice. The proximity to Ben Thanh Market added convenience, but the tranquil vibe made it feel worlds away. Perfect for a romantic escape amid Ho Chi Minh‚Äôs chaos.

Shopping with my husband in Ho Chi Minh City, I stumbled upon this treasure restaurant! The environment is really great, surrounded by greenery and it feels like a holiday. The dishes are authentic Vietnamese home-cooked, delicious and reasonably priced. It is very close to the market and subway station. Perfect for couples to come here for food and romantic time!

What a find! Calm relaxing atmosphere, excellent unobtrusive service, and the food was wonderful. Great flavours and textures. Can recommend the squid with salt and chilli, and the mango salad with fish. Prices very reasonably A hidden gem. Recommended

name: Cuc Gach Quan
address: 10 Dang Tat Ward Tan Dinh, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
description:
Recommended by a friend, I ate here. I ate here again after a short trip. It is definitely one of the most cost-effective Vietnamese dishes for middle-class people traveling to hcmc!

The price is cost-effective. One dish is only 100-200k vnd. Two people ordered 4 dishes and each person was about 100 yuan. But the drinks are relatively expensive!

Salad recommendation: Pomelo seafood salad. Very appetizing! The sour and spicy taste is suitable for Cantonese people!
Fried tofu. The skin is fried crispy, but the bean and egg flavor is not enough inside.
As for the soup, the base is sweet and sour. It is quite delicious with Catfish (but it is more oily)

If you want me to recommend a restaurant to hcmc, I will immediately recommend this one and only this one!
example_reviews: Recommended by a friend, I ate here. I ate here again after a short trip. It is definitely one of the most cost-effective Vietnamese dishes for middle-class people traveling to hcmc! The price is cost-effective. One dish is only 100-200k vnd. Two people ordered 4 dishes and each person was about 100 yuan. But the drinks are relatively expensive! Salad recommendation: Pomelo seafood salad. Very appetizing! The sour and spicy taste is suitable for Cantonese people! Fried tofu. The skin is fried crispy, but the bean and egg flavor is not enough inside. As for the soup, the base is sweet and sour. It is quite delicious with Catfish (but it is more oily) If you want me to recommend a restaurant to hcmc, I will immediately recommend this one and only this one!

We had an amazing dinner at the unique Vietnamese restaurant - based on home cooked food and occupying two homes across the street from each other. You are escorted upstairs to the table and a sumptuous feast followed - in fact a little too much. One specialty is deep fried tofu which we had been told about but to our tastes it was still like tasteless tofu, sadly. The remainder of the meal was excellent however and the service first rate, the ambience was very attractive and we would recommend this restaurant. It is a bit of a way off the main Saigon CBD so you will need transport, we had it all pre-booked. There is a modest wine list and the meal washed down with a good white wine was very enjoyable.

The feel was superb from beginning to end. We‚Äôve been traveling around Vietnam for 2 weeks and this was by far our favorite meal. We ordered an ungodly amount of food because we just couldn‚Äôt decide what to pick. My number one choice was the soft shell crab recommended by our waitress. We also loved the ginger chicken, the shrimp and bacon (more like pork belly)(incredible), papaya salad, pomelo salad with shrimp and pork, spring rolls, coconut smoothie, orange smoothie, Tom Collins cocktail, Good Morning Vietnam cocktail (the only thing that didn‚Äôt wow me), the fruit platter for dessert, and the herbal jelly. Every bite is flavorful and well presented. The building is interesting and homey. The service was great and the food came out quickly. We loved it! Thanks for a great dinner!

name: Shri Lifestyle Dining
address: 72-74 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai 23rd Floor Centec Tower, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
description: Shri Restaurant & Lounge has a casual outdoor garden terrace, a stylish non-smoking dining room and and an indoor glass house terrace, all with an outstanding view of the city. We also have a large comfortable lounge perfect for enjoying cocktails before or after dinner. Shri is well suited for everything from business lunch or dinners, romantic nights out & special occasions as well as our sunset happy hour for drinks from 15:00 to 19:00.
example_reviews: They have stunning view over looking Ho Chi Minh City. Great terrace table at nice for dinner. Great tapas menu good for sharing and amazing cocktail list that I think is extremly creative.

The welcome is good as staff guide you up to the restaurant, but the atmosphere when you get there is underwhelming. The eating area is next to the bar. The food was well cooked and tasty and the price feels right.

I chose this restaurant because one of my Saigonese friends recommended it after knowing that I was looking for a nice place with city view to have dinner with my friend in the centre. And I would love to recommend it as well now. There are inside and outside parts. I had an outdoor table near the glass wall then I was enjoying great city view while tasting delicious food. Tasty dishes, good drinks, fresh air! Love it!

name: Charm Bakery
address: S·ªë 10 L√™ Th·ªã Ri√™ng Ben Thanh Ward , District 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
description: Welcome to our Banh Mi shop & drinks We have many types of sandwiches : roast pork , bbq , roast chicken , eggs , vegetarian , pate & hams ... many fresh juice ( mango , avocado ... coffee , soft drink...)
example_reviews: We spontaneously ate a Banh Mi here for lunch when we were actually looking for another Banh Mi shop. The baguettes are very good and don't have liver pate on them, which was nice after all these days. The chicken was cut into slices and therefore not so dry and the vegetables were fresh. The Banh Mi here aren't exactly cheap though. One costs between 60,000 and 80,000 dong. The service was very friendly and we also got a free friendship bracelet that is supposed to bring us luck.

These were the first bahn mi of this trip and they did not disappoint the bread was fresh and crispy and the filling‚Äôs plentiful, I had roast pork and hubby had the special, we also had a coke and a mango smoothie which was so refreshing, all this for 190000 dong, being given the beautiful charm bracelet at the end is very special and a lovely momento of our trip. The lady who served us was so lovely. Tip- on the back of the menu they have things like how much chilli, coriander or no coriander and many more options so it makes ordering so easy.

Banh Mi very good and very rich! The ingredients are all fresh. Prices more than fair for sitting with air conditioning and soft drinks. The staff is very nice, it also says that if you don‚Äôt like Banh Mi at first bite you can say it and change it without problems.

name: Ph·ªü Vi·ªát Nam - Ph·∫°m H·ªìng Th√°i
address: 14 Pham Hong Thai Ph∆∞·ªùng B·∫øn Th√†nh, Qu·∫≠n 1, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
description: Great food! Loved the pho. I had the beef and tendon pho. They have large portions for a great price and there are plenty of condiments. I also had the egg soup. The pho was great but I‚Äôve never really had a bad pho since I have been here. For foreigners the pho is a bargain but compared to other places it is slightly more expensive. It‚Äôs a great place to chill inside and the customer service was amazing. It‚Äôs a Michelin star restaurant so totally recommend checking this out. I‚Äôve had heaps of pho and personally I like stopping into family owned shops with the locals. I wouldn‚Äôt pass this by whilst you are in HCM so have a try!
review_summary:
Ph·ªü Vi·ªát Nam - Ph·∫°m H·ªìng Th√°i receives accolades for its authentic pho, which guests have called out for its rich flavors and freshly made noodles. Nestled in the convenient location of district 1, the restaurant offers a warm and inviting atmosphere that many find enhances their dining experience.

The swift and amiable service contributes to the positive reviews, while the exceptional value for generous portions of delicious, authentic meals is consistently praised by patrons.

The pho was great but I‚Äôve never really had a bad pho since I have been here. For foreigners the pho is a bargain but compared to other places it is slightly more expensive. I‚Äôve had heaps of pho and personally I like stopping into family owned shops with the locals. I wouldn‚Äôt pass this by whilst you are in HCM so have a try!

Ph·ªü Vi·ªát Nam - Ph·∫°m H·ªìng Th√°i is a popular spot in Ho Chi Minh City, known for its rich, flavorful broth and fresh, house-made noodles. Their ph·ªü th·ªë ƒë√° (served in a hot stone bowl) keeps the soup warm till the last bite. With fast service and a clean, bustling atmosphere, it‚Äôs a great choice for authentic Vietnamese ph·ªü. Michelin Guide-approved!

Whow what an amazing restaurant & soo cheap. We had their best seller in the sizzling pho, the staff were super friendly and showed us how to make the sauces to go with it. The herbs ect to accompany the dish were fresh and well presented. There was heaps of beef in the soup and they make their noodles fresh onsite. It was busy, we weren‚Äôt rushed, it was clean, but mostly the food was soo delicious. We had a great experience here and if we had more time would have gone back. So worth finding this restaurant to have their Michelin Star Pho. Thank you for an enjoyable meal.

name: Banana Mama Rooftop & Kitchen
address: 102 ABC Cong Quynh WMC TOWER - 10th Floor, Ho Chi Minh City 700000 Vietnam
description: We love rooftops and found this place after visiting another rooftop nearby. We were impressed with modern and fun vibes, DJ set created great atmosphere, team was proactive and helpful with finding place to sit and fast to take our order. We wanted to try Smashed Burgers as we red good feedback about them and OMG they were so good we came back second time for them! Softest buns on earth, meat so juicy and smokey grilled, even gherkin so tasty- pure joy for burger lovers! Wish we had more days in Ho Chi Minh to try other burgers. Really great job!
example_reviews: We love rooftops and found this place after visiting another rooftop nearby. We were impressed with modern and fun vibes, DJ set created great atmosphere, team was proactive and helpful with finding place to sit and fast to take our order. We wanted to try Smashed Burgers as we red good feedback about them and OMG they were so good we came back second time for them! Softest buns on earth, meat so juicy and smokey grilled, even gherkin so tasty- pure joy for burger lovers! Wish we had more days in Ho Chi Minh to try other burgers. Really great job!

You shouldn't actually write a review so that it remains an insider tip, but this bar has to be reviewed. The location is in the south center of Saigon and we would always (again) take a taxi to and from the bar in the evening. There is a security guard in front of the apartment building (who also hails a taxi) and only a relatively small sign points to the bar, which you then reach by elevator from the lobby. And then? Wow, good music from various DJs (maybe a bit too loud, you still want to talk), nice people and good drinks of all kinds. We had a few drinks with friends, cocktails, draft beer, soft drinks and juices, everything was great. We were there for many hours and more than enjoyed it! The hamburgers are particularly worth mentioning and outstanding. You should be careful with superlatives, but these hamburgers are really world class! In addition, you sit or dance on a roof terrace with a great view of Saigon, the service is very friendly and quick and everything is affordable. You should definitely go! Crystal clear recommendation!

Awesome vibes, excellent service, friendly vibe and top notch management. Emily will teach you card games, and has fantastic drink recommendations. The staff kept me company while I waited for my friends, ask them about the burgers, the menus, the after parties üéâ Highly recommended.

name: Social Club Rooftop Bar
address: 76-78 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai Street, District 3 23rd Floor, Hotel des Arts Saigon, Ho Chi Minh City 70000 Vietnam
description: Perched on the 24th floor of H√¥tel des Arts Saigon, The Social Club Rooftop Bar offers breathtaking sunset views above the Saigon skyline. Guests can indulge in a selection of handcrafted cocktails, a refined wine list, and delectable food bites, all while relaxing by the infinity pool. The vibrant atmosphere is enhanced by live DJ sets. The perfect spot to unwind, socialize, and enjoy the stunning cityscape.
example_reviews: We always aim for a Sunday Brunch in our travels. We were staying at the hotel so booked into the brunch here. Upon arrival we were met by an enthusiastic staff member who showed us to our table. Our brunch included free flow drinks. There was a choice of four cocktails but I asked if it was possible to have another one and it was not a problem. The beer and wine were cold and readily available if you wished. The food was great - oysters, crab, prawns, lobster, lamb, beef, fish, sushi, salads, dessert, cheeses - and the list goes on. It was an excellent choice of food and no shortage. The two staff members who looked after us were fabulous. They were friendly and attentive. It is a great people watching venue. There was a real mixture of people - resident expats in groups, local couples enjoying a day out, groups of friends, mixed ages but all enjoying the afternoon. There was a DJ who played a good range of music. The only thing we didn't like was guys wearing singlets and flip flops. This is a fine dining restaurant. If there is one thing the hotel can do, it is to set and maintain a minimum standard and this should apply to dress. Apart from that, the brunch is worth a shot.

I went here for dinner by myself and Lan Linh F&B server was sooo friendly and supportive taking so many beautiful photos for me as I was here by myself to enjoy. I enjoyed the dinner and the pretty photos of me that she took for me I‚Äôm very happy. Thanks Linh! I‚Äôll be back again.

I visited the social club on 6 Nov for my late dinner. An energetic young man Nhan Bui greeted me with a big smile and addressed me to a window seat with a very nice view. He is not only very knowledgeable on what they can offer and also have the patience to identify what s the best solution/food which I might need. What I observed is that he is a very hard working staff, he always serve and clean my table at the right time. I believe it required a very good attention on the customers. Every step he made can let you to feel his passion on serving customers. Overall, food quality met the expectation while the services far exceed. Special thanks to him and his team mates for their kind and responsive services. And most of your team members can speak fluent English.
